tool_description:
We provide phonetical translation to Chinese. 
我们提供中文谐音翻译
name: HowToSpeak
title: HowToSpeak

api_list.name: English2Chinese
api_list.description: Translate your English into Chinese character phonetically.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text you want to translate. The value should be Chinese (when notrans=0) or English (when notrans=1)

optional_parameters.name: notrans
optional_parameters.description: Whether translate input text into Chinese first: Translate it (notrans = 0) or Don't translate it (notrans = 1)

api_list.name: Japanese2Chinese
api_list.description: Translate Japanese into Chinese character phonetically.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text you want to translate. The value should be Chinese (when notrans=0) or Japanese (when notrans=1)

optional_parameters.name: notrans
optional_parameters.description: Whether translate input text into Chinese first: Translate it (notrans = 0) or Don't translate it (notrans = 1)

api_list.name: Korean2Chinese
api_list.description: Translate Korean into Chinese character phonetically.

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: The text you want to translate. The value should be Chinese (when notrans=0) or Korean (when notrans=1)

optional_parameters.name: notrans
optional_parameters.description: Whether translate input text into Chinese first: Translate it (notrans = 0) or Don't translate it (notrans = 1)
